website_summaries.verdict: Designed as a healthy, tasty snack for kids, but parents love them too.
pros: Bars come in a smaller size, perfectly portioned for younger kids
They have a sweet taste that's appealing to kids, with a sugar content that parents approve of
The ingredients list is short, bringing even more comfort to parents
As with most Clif Bars, these are available in a variety of flavors
cons: The texture is less chewy than a typical candy bar, which takes some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Pre-chewed? 🐀
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box, I found 3-4 bars had the ends of the wrapper chewed open and the bars had been partially eaten. By the size of the marks, I assume it was a rodent. I haven’t had problems in the past (otherwise it would be a 4-5 star rating). The bars are quite good, but this was a bit shocking and disappointing to discover.
customer_reviews.author: Mantaray

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar!
customer_reviews.text: You might as well eat a snicker's bar, these things are like candy! On top of that this product made me sick, not sick as in throwing up, the other end, insides swelled an the bar passed right threw me like I never ate it! Not enough information as to whats in it besides the basic ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: NetWorkPro

customer_reviews.title: Bad Tasting, Possibly Counterfeit ZBars
customer_reviews.text: These chocolate brownie zbars have a very odd, terrible taste to them, and do not taste like the product normally does. I have been buying chocolate brownie z bars from amazon for a couple years and in the last two boxes I recently received, the bars are terrible and leave a stinging sensation on my tongue. I don't know if the seller has changed, but these taste like a counterfeit product.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: MY GUILTY PLEASURE
customer_reviews.text: I've been trying to cut down on sugar, candy bars, soda and the like. I've ordered these twice now and store them in my snack drawer at work whenever I crave something sweet. Despite everything being organic, there's still plenty of sugar in here. I'm no angel when it comes to eating the right things, but at least I try. First bite. . . you immediately realize its a energy bar as you chew through oatmeal and such. But the chocolate flavor is so powerful, you forget it's supposed to be healthy and devour pretty quickly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Vanle

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I've been calling these "candy bars" to my kids for so long that they really don't know what a candy bar is. LoL So when they get one for breakfast in a rush I'm always worried they will say to their teacher they ate a "candy bar" for breakfast. LoL
customer_reviews.author: Julia Janzen

customer_reviews.title: Daily go-to for breakfast on the go
customer_reviews.text: Our daily go-to bar. Default breakfast option for my kids who are not your typical breakfast eaters and can’t have eggs. I rely on these for breakfast and snacks. Not too sweet though I wish sometimes it was a little less sweet. Kids love it though.
customer_reviews.author: NJCAMom

customer_reviews.title: great on the go snack
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these, and I love that they love them! These were much cheaper than at the local retailer, and came in a box that was easy for organizing in my pantry. These bars are perfect for my to throw in my purse if we are on the run and I don't ever have to worry about the kids not wanting the snack that I have for them. These bars are a much better choice than candy bars or chips that you can just pick up on the go.
customer_reviews.author: jlouderback

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these!!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a picky eater! I have went through so many different brands of bars and always had a hard time trying to find something he likes. I decided to try the Z bar and finally success! He loves the taste of these!! These bars come highly recommended. The cost savings is amazing compared to what they are at Walmart ($12 per box of 18)
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: A snack everyone in the family loves, made from good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: These taste great, have actual ingredients, and are the perfect grab and go snack for the whole family. My kids have requested this for their school snack everyday and I’m happy to be given them something they want that I approve of. Anytime we have a full day outing or a road trip, this is the first snack I grab because everyone in the family will eat it.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Good
customer_reviews.text: My kids like these but one of the boxes had some bad bars in it- the sell by date was fine but we still had two bars that were rock hard and it was obvious air had gotten into the individual wrappers. Must have been a bad batch/fluke, but for the price per bar losing a couple makes them really not a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: A perfect healthy snack that I always keep in my diaper ...
customer_reviews.text: A perfect healthy snack that I always keep in my diaper bag. They are individually wrapped so I can keep them in my car, bag, pockets, really everywhere. These help my daughter when she needs something in between meals. They are much less expensive to buy in this quantity. Our home is never without these.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not stored at proper temperatures.
customer_reviews.text: We just received our box of clif kids z bars, subscribe and save. I am not happy at with the quality of this box. The chocolate is all separated like it wasn't stored at the proper temperatures. And it wasn't just from shipping, it's from long term storage. I've never had this happen before. It's sever enough I'm considering canceling my subscription. We typically love these, but this delivery hs me questioning storage of grocery foods.
customer_reviews.author: Little Ladies Mama

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are picky eaters and I have been trying but to come up with healthier snacks for afterschool and decided to give these a go. All of my kids love these and they are hard to keep around for long. So I subscribed to have these delivered every month just Incase I forget to pick up any at the store and we run out. Haven’t tried the other flavours but plan too!
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Fleming

customer_reviews.title: Look before you bite!
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to check before you bite! Someone might want to fire the QC person at Cliff Bars. Looks like a nice string in my bar but it’s not listed on the ingredients
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: Hit or miss
customer_reviews.text: We have been ordering these bars for our 5 year old son every month for about a year. Every now and then we get a bad batch where our son refuses to eat them. This has happened the last two shipments in a row, so I am not sure what changed but we cancelled our subscription and now buy them by the box in the supermarket.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Lee Bourne

customer_reviews.title: No Peanut Butter taste
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! These barely have any peanut butter taste. The list of ingredients says fig paste is used and you can definitely taste the fig. The bar tastes like Fig Newtons. One of my kids will eat it and the other hates it.
customer_reviews.author: mamabear

customer_reviews.title: Healthy organic yummy bars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this chocolate chip and chocolate brownie zbar. In fact we all love these. They tastes so good and with clean ingredients. Not guilty of feeding them with unhealthy snacks. Definitely will keep buying these. Contains fig paste not any artificial sugar or corn syrup.
customer_reviews.author: Depp

customer_reviews.title: The bars were hard and stale although there was a 7/2019 exp date on them...
customer_reviews.text: The bars were hard and stale although there was a 7/2019 exp date on them...By the time we opened the individual wrappers they were hard as rocks and inedible. Total waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bar for Kids | Taste great | Awesome Alternate to Junk Food
customer_reviews.text: My MIL brought this one for our little one and she loved it. We now buy this in bulk as this is one of her fav. snack at her school and on our road trips. It tastes so good that even adults also enjoy eating the leftover. Great product and definitely not a junk food. If you are looking for an alternative healthy snack certainly add this one to your list. You won't get disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: The Patels

customer_reviews.title: Taste Great
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I’m an adult but these bars have great flavor and keep you full for awhile. It has more sugar than I prefer. The normal sized cliff bars are too big for me. These are great size.
customer_reviews.author: littlebud314

customer_reviews.title: nice bars- love subscribe and save
customer_reviews.text: I love these and so do my kids. They are nut-free so they can go to school with them. Great on the go snack. We subscribe and save and its so nice that they just appear at my house when I need them
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gruel

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. Personally I find them a little chalky tasting but I find that with most health bars. My daughter loves them though and feels like she is getting a treat since they are called chocolate brownie
customer_reviews.author: Averi

customer_reviews.title: Adult consumer and proud of it
customer_reviews.text: I am not ashamed to admit it. I am an adult and I buy these bars for myself. Very tasty. Satisfies a chocolate craving without tons of calories. Great for a snack at work. I may even eat one for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: kd md

customer_reviews.title: These were melted.
customer_reviews.text: I like Z bars, but the van driver placed all envelopes to be delivered on the dashboard of the vehicle. It is sunny and 83 degrees. Dashboards get hot, things melt. I won't be ordering food from amazon again. Btw, it did not sit on my porch for a long time. I was home and got the package right away. The box was very hot.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kimmerly

customer_reviews.title: came damaged box
customer_reviews.text: this box was damaged and i was going to return it and forgot. so the window to replace is closed. but i feel the taste isn't what it used to be and worried there are something wrong w the bars because of the box.
customer_reviews.author: None

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste like a chocolate brownie z bar.
customer_reviews.text: I’m wondering if this is an authentic product. It tastes like raspberry, but chocolate brownie.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These Clif bars are delicious! Low sugar with whole grains, I enjoy eating them! I don’t feel bad giving them to my kids as a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Pet817

customer_reviews.title: Great taste that my kids love!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this product and it works well for after school snacks, or an easy item to pack for our outdoor adventures. It has quality ingredients, and filling with a pleasant taste that my kids appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Favorite new flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my son's favorite flavor of Zbar. Sure, Zbars are processed and it'd be healthier to give him a carrot or something but they are so convenient and I appreciate they are organic. Wish they had less sugar so I try not to let him eat them everyday! Glad to be able to get it in this multipack online because this flavor is not sold in all retail locations.
customer_reviews.author: jwmitchell

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The bar is okay. The chocolate flavor could be a bit richer. It’s not a bar that you want to have over and over again. I should have gotten the brownie fudge which is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: nilat

customer_reviews.title: Good for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my whole family - my kids just think they’re a sweet treat and for me they’re a decent snack choice for in between meals. I wish they had more protein and less sugar but I guess that’s where the “adult” Clif bars come in. Much more convenient for me to purchase these so everyone can enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Rippel

customer_reviews.title: Bars opened in box
customer_reviews.text: I get these bars on auto delivery from Amazon and this order 5 bars or so were opened at the ends and hard as a rock. They almost broke a tooth! Is there any way to credit the account for the last shipment we received? The SN on one of the bars that were already opened are 2225219414 Their EXP was 15 of April this year so they should have been ok. It must have been due to the broken seal on them.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A. Terwillger

customer_reviews.title: they love the flavor and want us to buy more
customer_reviews.text: We put these in my kids' lunch boxes for school. The energy boost is good but does not make them crazy vibrating robot monkeys like other energy foods and drinks do. They say they love the flavor and want us to buy more. That is a good enough of a review for us!
customer_reviews.author: c.j.travisTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these and I enjoy them too. The flavor and texture are great. Portion size is perfect too. I appreciate the better ingredients than in other granola type bars. One of our favorite snack options.
customer_reviews.author: Sug Hill

customer_reviews.title: Good on the go snack
customer_reviews.text: Great snack for kids on the go. I keep several in my car (in winter) for my daughter when we are rushing to swim team then to king fu. Do wish it had less sugar though.
customer_reviews.author: Denyse Hurst

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy after school, lunch box, or to go snack
customer_reviews.text: Healthy snack I keep on hand for when we are called on to pick up our granddaughter from school as she is usually ravenous by that time. These have received her mom’s seal of approval also!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Aliano

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these!
customer_reviews.text: These Clif Kid ZBars are amazing. We are often on the go and these are great to put in my kids little bags as quick snacks. We take them to theme parks, school, and just keep them in my purse to help stop meltdowns from toddlers who skip their naps! ;) Also was delivered on time which I appreciate.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great on-the-go snack
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these for after school snacks or trail snacks while hiking. They are not too sweet and not too messy. They are great to pop in a purse, backpack, etc, because they do not crumble or melt, even though they are chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Book Mom

customer_reviews.title: I love them.
customer_reviews.text: Great bars. We had them on subscribe and save. So we’re a little tired of eating the same bars all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kids love!
customer_reviews.text: My kiddos really only like the chocolate brownie flavor so buying at Costco isn’t a good option. Love that you can pick a specific flavor! Kiddos love them! Biggest problem is trying to not run out.
customer_reviews.author: Kierstin L cefalu

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids lunches
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I care about the organic part but these are but free, vaguely healthy and non perishable so good for summer camp lunches
customer_reviews.author: DMV Mom

customer_reviews.title: stale - to hard to even chew!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 4 boxes of the Clif Kid ZBar and also 4 boxes of Clif Kid ZBar Protein on June 3, 2018. We opened the boxes within a couple days after receiving them, but I am just now writing this review b/c a friend told me she had a similar experience. They were so hard and stale that we couldn't even chew them! Not sure what happened to this shipment. We ordered the same bars 2 other times and they were fine. But never again will I order food from Amazon - that was a lot of money wasted!
customer_reviews.author: tracey pesce

customer_reviews.title: UNTRUSTWORTHY
customer_reviews.text: CLIF KID ZBAR WERE EXPIRED!!!! YUCK!! I opened one box of the three to compare labels on other bars I still had and it was clearly expired!!!!!!! TRIED TO CONTACT MULTIPLE TIMES AND NEVER CORRESPONDED WITH ME REGARDING THIS ISSUE.
customer_reviews.author: Denise LaPlace

customer_reviews.title: School snack
customer_reviews.text: My Grandson absolutely loves the Clif Kid ZBAR. Perfect for school snack. Amazon makes my life easier having these bars delivered on our subscribe and save .. Thank you 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: lisa b.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My children enjoy that it taste like a brownie. The size is right for a snack.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Good snack on the go
customer_reviews.text: Kind of spendy for a snack. But we take them to the lake and my kids like them.
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Wynn

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Daughter rotates between 4 different flavors of these for breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect snack.
customer_reviews.text: These are really good. My teenage son loves them. Great for on the go or to take to school for a snack. And they taste good too.
customer_reviews.author: sarahxsays

customer_reviews.title: Picky 4 year old approved
customer_reviews.text: My 4.5 year old daughter LOVES these. And she's extremely picky
customer_reviews.author: M Molina

customer_reviews.title: Sugary crap
customer_reviews.text: Just give the kid a regular Clif bar if you need to but these are overprice and not any more nutritional than the original.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great for breakfast or as a snack
customer_reviews.text: These bars are great! They're pretty low calorie, so I use them as a buffer between meals when I'm feeling hungry. And they taste great!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Flavor actually has a halfway decent chocolate influence.
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients, and very happy that it's organic. Another plus is that it provides me with high quality energy. Overall very, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: john l

customer_reviews.title: Kids, man. What can you do?
customer_reviews.text: Good lord these things are disgusting. Cocoa cardboard. But my kids want one every single morning and they’re reasonably nutritious (basically same as a bowl of cereal). So might as well buy in bulk!
customer_reviews.author: Zara

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was open! Bars were stale
customer_reviews.text: We have been purchasing this pack of z bars for months and this order was defective. Half of the bar wrappers were open and the bars inside were stale and hard. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer mason

customer_reviews.title: For your toddler who won't eat
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. My two year old son is not a good eater. He loves the chocolate brownie adult Clif bars, so we bought him these. It is a great size for a toddler and good nutrition. He will only eat this flavor. Good snack if you can't reason with a two year old on why they need to eat dinner.
customer_reviews.author: V V

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price point for these Z bars. Walmart sells 6 bars for $4. 18 bars for $11 is cheaper than any other store. My daughters love these as an after school snack or a quick pick me up while we’re out. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pretty in Pink

customer_reviews.title: Healthy kid snacks
customer_reviews.text: My kid eats these bars all the time. I feel better knowing he has this in his school lunch to provide protein & healthy ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: bwaton

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these and more approves of ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Love these cliff bars! I really love that they try to put better ingredients then your average snack bar!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious. Priced well than most places.
customer_reviews.text: I have this as subscribe and save. Love this flavor and the oatmeal as well
customer_reviews.author: Coach James

customer_reviews.title: These are so good!
customer_reviews.text: All of my kids love these. They are easy to chew and super delicious. The wrappers are also easy to open which is so important for tiny hands!
customer_reviews.author: RealAshMas

customer_reviews.title: Stale and unappetizing.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my 4 year old will not go near these. I tried one and realized how unappetizing they are. Tastes stale and like that have been in storage for far too long.
customer_reviews.author: OSMDC

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these
customer_reviews.text: My son loves easy is there a great quick snack and I feel good knowing it’s not junk food
customer_reviews.author: megara77

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Myself and my kids love these! Great snack for on the run and super yummy!
customer_reviews.author: WaarmWaterDiver

customer_reviews.title: Received a sealed wrapper with no bar, but kids love them.
customer_reviews.text: You know it makes you wonder if you have to worry about the quality control when you receive an empty wrapper that’s sealed with no bar inside. My kids absolutely love these and I don’t feel so guilty giving them these as a snack, but it was a huge disappointment to receive a box with one less bar.
customer_reviews.author: twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Not just for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an endurance athlete and train upwards of 25 hours a week and these are the only energy bars I eat. They actually taste like real food instead of most of the other energy bars out there that are full of sugar substitutes and taste fake and chemically. Plus my neice and nephew are all over my stash of these bars when they come to visit, so it's a win win!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Mousseau

customer_reviews.title: Poor shipping condition
customer_reviews.text: We have these on Subscribe & Save, because my kids love them. The photo attached is how they arrived this month. I know it won’t affect the taste of the bars, but I don’t think it should arrive so tattered looking that I feel the need to count the bars to see if I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old doesn't like them but my 8 year old does
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old doesn't like them but my 8 year old does. If for whatever reason my 8 year old changes her mind (and that has definitely happened before) then lucky for me they taste delicious and I get to eat them!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica N.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical taste- bad batch
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE. The bars taste like chemicals and have a funky taste to them overall. They usually do not taste like this so I am confused. Shared them with others and they agreed there was something not right about the bars. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwani Kumar

customer_reviews.title: kiddos love these bars
customer_reviews.text: choco chips and oatmeal feel lighter than brownie ones. great taste, quality ingredients and pricing under 'subscribe & save'
customer_reviews.author: apprieto

customer_reviews.title: Toddler fave
customer_reviews.text: Perfect addition to my toddler’s lunch box. He looks forward to them and I know he’s getting some good nutrition and ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Birdsall

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: Yum, these are my kids favorite. I love that I can just buy the chocolate chip flavor and not have to buy a verity pack in order to buy in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Sarbear04

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: The product I received is defective. It is still within it's expiration date but it must not have been stored properly as the bars I opened we're not of a quality that I want me or my family to ingest. I am not sure if I will purchase from here again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My son and I both love these!!! And its a great value since we've added it to the subscribe and save deal!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than walmart!
customer_reviews.text: Like a protein bar, but tastes good. My daughter (12 years old) and I (33 male) love these. I eat 1 or more every day. Filling snack that taste great, they're cheaper here than Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: DIYPowerUp

customer_reviews.title: Great organic bar
customer_reviews.text: These are my kids favorite bar is! Great price here on Amazon. Will keep buying
customer_reviews.author: Coldy

customer_reviews.title: A few bars were already open, obviously hardened and ...
customer_reviews.text: A few bars were already open, obviously hardened and had some white specks in them when I broke one in half. Completely unacceptable. Gross. These are one of the few processed bars I allow my kid to eat, so thanks.
customer_reviews.author: meredith

customer_reviews.title: We love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. I have them on an auto subscription every month. Saves me from going to the store and them possibly not having in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great snack
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these as snacks. I kind of wish they would do like a half size bar because I do find a lot of half eaten ones saved for later.
customer_reviews.author: Jenerator

customer_reviews.title: A Favorite at our house
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a cleaner granola/energy bar than look no further. My 4 year old loves these and I love knowing that they are quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Baxter's BandB

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Bars are very tasty. I use them when I need to take medicine, they give my stomach the right protection to avoid problems with medicine on an empty stomach. And of course I use them for a delicious snack.
customer_reviews.author: lani girl*

customer_reviews.title: simply great
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Kids love it and we love that you can choose a single flavor instead of being forced to buy a variety pack like at big box clubs.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: My girls LOVE these bars
customer_reviews.text: My girls LOVE these bars. Because of the quality ingredients, I feel good about giving these to them for breakfast when we're in a rush or for an afternoon snack. The bars have a nice chewy texture and it isn't too sweet (a plus!). My husband also loves these so the three of them will have to duke it out for the last bar. =)
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & Healthy Snack
customer_reviews.text: We tried a couple of these brownie bars and they're both delicious and healthy! Makes a great snack. We've tried other flavors of these Z Bars also (choc. chip, graham cracker). They're all really good. But I think these are my favorite. I've tried the "adult" Cliff's energy/snack bars and have to say that I think these Cliff's Kid bars taste a lot better. Liked them so much that we put them on the Amazon subscription service.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: love these perfect for on the go breakfast
customer_reviews.text: I buy these bars for a quick on the go nite for breakfast for my 5 year olds. She loves them and they aren't bad for her
customer_reviews.author: gmo

customer_reviews.title: We love these Clif bars
customer_reviews.text: We love these Clif bars! My kids usually have a cheese stick and a Clif bar or an applesauce pouch and a Clif bar for breakfast. They can get it themselves, portable if you have a long drive to school/work and delicious. I think these are pretty nutritious ( for a bar).
customer_reviews.author: Mjsul

customer_reviews.title: Messy
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it but very messy compared to choc chip or oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these and they fill them up as a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: LIM

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy treat
customer_reviews.text: Had fun handing these out for the little kids for Halloween Parents were super happy
customer_reviews.author: loofah creations

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting healthy bars!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for myself as I like low calorie bars that taste great. I really like the taste!
customer_reviews.author: Britney A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Kindergartener loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Great as an addition to my kids lunch and convenient to have in my purse for emergency situations.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser333

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and comes bi-monthly
customer_reviews.text: I found that these are a granola bar I enjoy. The price, when ordered as part of the subscription, is decent. I have them set up to come every two months. I find this makes them a treat, without having them always be in the pantry. Chocolate taste while also containing some other ingredients that might not be half bad for me. And even though they are for kids, they are a good treat for adults too.
customer_reviews.author: BertAndErnie

customer_reviews.title: My kids love these
customer_reviews.text: My kids eat these a lot. All flavors. They love them. Good price and great taste.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wiebelhaus

customer_reviews.title: Great texture and flavor
customer_reviews.text: I really love the flavor and texture of the chocolate chip flavor. It reminds me of cookie dough, but much healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Trice

customer_reviews.title: Our Children love these.
customer_reviews.text: Our children are 3 and 6 years old, like most children they love snacking and when I give them these to snack on I don't feel guilty about it because they are a healthier type of snack.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Quick Breakfasts!
customer_reviews.text: My elementary school aged child eats these probably 4 days a week for breakfast. They say it is delicious and I love the fact that it is quick and fairly healthy. Unwrap the bar, put out a cup of fruit, and breakfast is done!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I know exactly what my children are getting and they live the taste. They seem to keep them full for quite awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in size change
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed in the change in size of these bars. They are the same length, but about half the width for the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Great healthy snack
customer_reviews.text: Great healthy snack! Love these for my 3 year old! So great as an on the go snack for the car or park! They have great flavor! I have to admit that I usually end up eating a couple from each box myself they are so good! They are organic so I feel great allowing my daughter to snack on them!
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it-kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but as nearly all protein bars, a little dry but good overall!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: What can I say.. they are cliff bars . Yum yum
customer_reviews.author: patrick dolan

product_meta.title: Clif Kid ZBAR - Organic Granola Bars - Chocolate Chip - (1.27 Ounce Energy Bars, Lunch Box Snacks, 18 Count)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Chocolate ChipCLIF Kid Zbar is an organic, baked whole grain, granola bar snack, made with a blend of carbohydrates, fiber, protein, and fat to give kids energy so they can keep zipping and zooming along. Our products never include high fructose corn syrup or artificial flavors.
feature_bullets: DELICIOUS TASTE: All the thick, chewy, goodness of a chocolate chip cookie - gone nutritious!
SOFT-BAKED & WHOLE GRAIN: Zbar is an organic, soft & chewy granola bar made with 8-11g whole grains; it is also a good source of fiber
ORGANIC & NON-GMO: CLIF Kid cares about the planet just as much as your kids! That is why Zbar is certified USDA Organic and Non-GMO
A GO-TO FOR PARENTS: Zbar is lunch box ready, free from ingredients that parents are looking to avoid, such as high fructose corn syrup, artificial flavors, and synthetic preservatives
DESIGNED TO NOURISH: Zbar is made with a blend of carbohydrates, fiber, protein, and fat to keep kids satisfied at snack time and give them energy to keep zipping and zooming throughout the day
